name: ComlaJS
description: A lightweight Common Language Runtime for web applications

scripts.build: webpack && cd ./build && uglifyjs comla.js --comments "/^!/" -c -m --mangle-props --mangle-regex "/^_/" -o comla.min.js --source-map comla.min.js.map
scripts.demo: npm run build && mkdirp ./demo/assets && cd ./build && copy "*.*" "../demo/assets" && cd ../demo && http-server -a localhost -p 4768 -c-1 -o -U --cors
